# array-mean

  [![NPM version][npm-image]][npm-url]
  [![npm download][download-image]][download-url]

Get the average value in an array.

## Installation

`$ npm install --save ml-array-mean`

## Usage

```js
import mean from 'ml-array-mean';

const result = mean([1, 5, 3, 2, 4]);
// 3
```
